text: Richard Albert Van Arsdale (February 22, 1943 - December 16, 2024) was an American professional basketball player and coach in the National Basketball Association (NBA). He was born in Indianapolis, Indiana. His playing career lasted from 1965 to 1977. He played for the New York Knicks and the Phoenix Suns. He coached the Suns in 1987. He had an identical twin brother Tom Van Arsdale, who was also a basketball player. Van Arsdale died of kidney failure in Phoenix, Arizona on December 16, 2024 at the age of 81.‘Original Sun’ Dick Van Arsdale dies at 81 years old ==References== ==Other websites== * Basketball-Reference.com: Dick Van Arsdale (as coach) * Phoenix Suns History: Dick Van Arsdale Category:1943 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Phoenix Suns players Category:New York Knicks players Category:Sportspeople from Indianapolis Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:Twin people from the United States
